titleStmt.title: The royal table of the laws of humane nature.
titleStmt.author: Sharrock, Robert, 1630-1684.
Sharrock, Robert, 1630-1684. Hypothesis ēthikē de officiis secundum naturæ jus Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Hensman, at the Kings head in Westminster-hall,

notesStmt.note: An outline of: Sharrock, Robert. Hypothesis ēthikē de officiis secundum naturæ jus.
At end of text: Explained and confirmed at large, by Ro. Sharrock, ... in his treatise of duties according to the law of nature.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
